changeSet.author: kcando
changeSet.sql:
IF EXISTS (SELECT * FROM dbo.sysobjects WHERE id = object_id(N'dbo.update_guild_max_withdraw') AND OBJECTPROPERTY(id, N'IsProcedure') = 1) DROP PROCEDURE dbo.update_guild_max_withdraw GO
CREATE PROCEDURE dbo.update_guild_max_withdraw @guild_id dbo.id_t, @max_withdraw BIGINT AS SET NOCOUNT ON
UPDATE dbo.Guilds SET max_withdraw = @max_withdraw WHERE id = @guild_id
SET NOCOUNT OFF
changeSet.rollback: IF EXISTS (SELECT * FROM dbo.sysobjects WHERE id = object_id(N'dbo.update_guild_max_withdraw') AND OBJECTPROPERTY(id, N'IsProcedure') = 1) DROP PROCEDURE dbo.update_guild_max_withdraw GO
